passive.name: MARTIAL CADENCE
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) MARTIAL CADENCE
                                The first attack against an enemy deals bonus physical damage equal to 8% of their current Health (5 second cooldown per unique enemy).

q.name: (Q) DRAGON STRIKE
q.description:
(Q) DRAGON STRIKE
 9/8/7/6s   50/55/60/65 
                                
                                
                                Extends Jarvan IV's lance, dealing 85 physical damage (85/140/195/250 + 130% bonus  ) and reducing the Armor of enemies hit by 25/30/35/40% for 3 seconds.If the lance contacts a Demacian Standard it will pull Jarvan IV to the Demacian Standard's location, knocking up enemies in his path for 0.75 seconds.

w.name: (W) GOLDEN AEGIS
w.description:
(W) GOLDEN AEGIS
 10s   30 
                                
                                
                                Unleashes a regal aura that slows surrounding enemies by 30/35/40/45% for 2 seconds and grants a shield that absorbs 100/140/180/220 plus 5% of his max Health for 5 seconds.Absorbs 10 (1,6/1,9/2,2/2,5% max  ) more damage for each nearby enemy champion hit.

e.name: (E) DEMACIAN STANDARD
e.description:
(E) DEMACIAN STANDARD
 11/10.5/10/9.5s   55 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Gains 20/25/30/35% Attack Speed.Active: Throws a Demacian Standard that deals 80 magic damage (80/135/190/245 + 80% ) and remains in place for 8 seconds, granting nearby ally champions 30/35/40/45% Attack Speed.Tapping this ability while near a Demacian Standard will cast Dragon Strike towards it.

r.name: (R) CATACLYSM
r.description:
(R) CATACLYSM
 70/65/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Heroically leaps to an enemy champion, dealing 200 physical damage (200/350/500 + 170% bonus ) to nearby enemies and creating an arena of impassable terrain around them for 3.5 seconds.Damage dealt by enemies within the arena is reduced by 12/16/20%.The effect ends once they leave the terrain or when it collapses.Cast again to collapse the terrain.

boots_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

boots_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
boots_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

situational_items_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
situational_items_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

example_build_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

runes_detailed.name: Coup de Grace
runes_detailed.description: Rune effect for Coup de Grace
Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it for 4 seconds, dealing bonus damage.
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal reduced damage.
